item.title: 10 Greatest Human vs. Nature Movies Ever Made
item.description: Determined protagonists fight for survival against the cruelest conditions in the best films to explore the "human versus nature" conflict.

item.title: "I Feel Like This Movie Did Anakin Better": How Coriolanus Snow Evolved Into Hunger Games Villain Based On Key Elements Assessed By Psychologist
item.description: A psychologist unpacks Coriolanus Snow's villainous transition in the Hunger Games prequel, explaining the reasons behind the character's dark twists.

item.title: What Do Actors Snort In Movies? Hollywood Fake Cocaine Explained
item.description: From Scarface to The Wolf of Wall Street, there is some question about what actors snort in these drug-fueled movies in place of actual cocaine.
